title: "I called mid first,  let me mid or I'll afk & feed!!!" ummm.. Hello? TeamBuilder would like a word.
body:
How long has TeamBuilder been out? Hopefully long enough for people to know it's an option to queue up for. 

Honestly, this idea of joining a game and immediately calling a lane is just ridiculous. More than HALF of the game end up like this in champion select:

teemo4lyfe: TOP 
alwaysToppingorf33din: TOP TOP TOP
teemo4lyfe: HEY MAAAAAAAN I CALLED TOP FIRST, L00K RIGHT HERE <teemo4lyfe: TOP alwaystoppingorf33din: TOP TOP TOP> IM TOP KKKKKKKKK?
alwayssToppingorf33din: lol n3rD i'm top or i troll k tyvm
teemo4lyfe: lol 2 top then, i don't care anymore ill just feed more than my usual level of expected feeding
alwaysToppingorf33din: no ur a nerd lvl 99, im going top alone or ill feed way more than you will!!!1!11 :) :)

Rest of the team: . . . . . {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} 

This is just frustrating to deal with, it's so damn childish and immature to fight over a role like that, if you really want your stupid top or mid or adc, and want nothing else, PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF GOD, QUEUE UP FOR TEAMBUILDER. It takes 5 min to find a game, but you get your role every time

Just because you call some role or lane, doesn't mean you deserve it, it doesn't mean that you will get it, and it for sure doesn't mean you can whine like a little baby if you're not satisfied with the outcome. 

You queue up with 4 other random players, and it's everyone's role to work together and come up with something that works. 
You want top Riven really bad? But hold up, so that player 3 and player 4, perhaps you can take a break from Riven and try out going ADC for a while, or take riven in the jungle. 
ENOUGH IS ENOUGH

----
TEAMBUILDER is a thing, please use this gametype if you really really want to play 1 thing every game, and aren't willing to compromise (and or) are still a child.

Look, I wanted to play lee sin jungle a lot for some reason, played teambuilder a couple of times in a row. Waited on average 5-10min (since I played between 1am - 5am EST), and had my role every time. Just please, enough with this role calling and whining,

i usually play support or jungle when i just want to chill because even though i can farm pretty well when i see how bad the others in my tier farm, i get really frustrated whenever i miss cs where i could easily get it if i would just concentrate more. sounds stupid but i can't really explain that, whatever. yeah support can be fun but that really depends on your adc, if you get a 20% winrate in ranked vayne main who blames everything on their support after she tumbled into 2 assasins it'll eventually start to get really frustrating.

Nah, just mute the ADC in those cases. People say "oh, but what if they want to communicate something important??? D:".

Pro Tip (from someone that's dealt with toxicity enough to know):

If the ADC is constantly blaming you for everything, they're NOT LIKELY TO SAY ANYTHING OTHER THAN TOXICITY! Just mute them and carry on.

Another alternative that I've had SOME manner of luck doing, is to just say you're not going to support an [expletive], and that you're going to go support another lane. USUALLY sends the ADC into an apologetic rant for a bit, and it USUALLY ends their toxicity, but not always.

Use the alternative method at your own risk!
Zyra jg is legit, lile no joke it is GOOD.
i know but you'll get flamed almost every match anyways as long as it's not played in the lcs or by a famous streamer. Even did it in ranked twice and won both matches.
The greater question is why riot hasn't just straight up removed blind pick and make Teambuilder the way to play norms if you dont want to play draft.

They've even gone the opposite direction by raising Team Builder from requiring level 10 to level 25.

I can understand why blind pick is the first game mode available to new players.  They probably won't know what the roles mean, or what unspoken expectations come with them.  They won't have the champion pool yet to do draft.  But I hate how anti-social blind pick is right out of the gate.  You call your role like you're calling shot gun.  Forget saying "hi" to anyone.  The first interaction with other players is likely to be an argument.  And that's the mode Riot expects players to put up with for the first 25 levels.

No wonder there's so much toxicity in this game.
Some of us just want a quick game and ~~don't want to wait 30 mins to find a support or whatever role isn't popular that day~~ are willing to play multiple roles.

ADC: Can you please not play Ashe jungler? I wanted to play her.
Ashe Jungler: I'm going to do that now, just because you said that.

Why do people in blind pick go out of their ways to be jerks like that? I had to dodge because not only was that a bad pick, but she's clearly not a team player on top of it. I had to dodge another game earlier because this Shaco joined, locked in mid, and said nothing else what so ever. The person who called mid threatened to troll him back, and it was just a huge toxic dramatic mess. A lot of us play video games to escape that kind of drama. When selfish people enter champion select like that, it creates a toxic mess.

Another thing I absolutely cannot stand, and do not understand is the **junglers **that say, "JG JG JG JG JGJJGJAGJ JGJGJGJGJGJGJG JG" a dozen differnet times in the chat for a good 10 seconds so that nobody sees who got what and we have to spend 30 seconds figuring out who got what, and a lot of times you don't. My past 8 junglers have all called jungler in the chat at least 4 times in a row. Does Riot need to put in big bold letters that spamming the chat does not help you get your role? Has it really gotten that bad?

Blind pick is an absolute mess, and Riot needs to get serious about fixing it because it's extremely bad this summer.

LOL I just tried another blind pick champion select. Someone called mid, 2 other people picked mid champions first before talking, locked. Karthus decided to go ADC, and when I asked Katarina what she was doing, she said she's jungling without smite. Our support who was also AP, got spooked by our chances of being able to stay alive, and thankfully she dodged. This is ridiculous.
New meta bro;)
Simple fix, perma ban every account that does this :) Would cut down on trolling, and as a result, cut down on the "toxicity" that players like this get.

You realize trolls can make multiple accounts or even buy accounts. It won't entirely cut down on the toxic players. It may help a little bit. We cannot fix this community. League is a salt can. Case closed.

So then why do they punish "verbal abuse"? Those players just make new names. Just because someone can make a new account doesn't mean you shouldn't punish them. I mean, I don't see a person going through the trouble of making too many smurfs that get permabanned by level 15 each time.

Also, you either live long enough to become a troll or just quit the game. People become trolls because of other trolls. That is also another reason why I think you can't fix the league community. It's a salty can... Everyone is toxic once in a while.
You don't get permabanned until after like 5 2 week bans or something. I forget but it is pretty hard to get permabanned unless you cuss out some riot support in an email.
